title: Magna Carta Copy Offered As Incentive For U.S. To Get Into World War II
teaser: Monday is the 800th anniversary of the Magna Carta. Ari Shapiro talks to Julian Harrison of the British Library in London about how Britain tried to use the document to get the U.S. into the war.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
